name: European Liver Patients' Association
legal: NON FOR PROFIT ASSOCIATION - organisation of liver diseases patients
goal: ELPA’s vision is that all liver patients are diagnosed in time, are treated with respect, and have equal access to the best standard of medical care - regardless of origin, lifestyle, and type of liver disease. Our ultimate goal is a world without liver diseases.
interests: Budget, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Renewal of the alcohol strategy, chronic diseases, viral hepatitis, Action plan for the health sector response to viral hepatitis in the WHO European Region, EP Resolution on HIV/ Aids, Tuberculosis and Hepatitis C, CSF, INTEGRATE, LiverHope, EIT LiverScreen, MICROB-PREDICT, ACHIEVE, ERN, Friends of Liver MEP Group, GALAXY...
